net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder

Class AbstractFeeder<T extends Feeder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.component.ComponentBase
      • net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder.AbstractFeeder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Feeder<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultBasicFeeder, DefaultPollingFeeder, DefaultStreamFeeder

    public abstract class AbstractFeeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
extends ComponentBase
implements Feeder<T>
    An abstract feeder implementation.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • setMaxQueueSize

        public T setMaxQueueSize(long maxSize)
        Description copied from interface: Feeder
        Sets the maximum feed queue size. The feeder uses an underlying queue to track which messages have been emitted from the component but not yet acked. This indicates how many messages may reside in the queue (in memory) at any given time.
        Specified by:
        setMaxQueueSize in interface Feeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
        Parameters:
        maxSize - The maximum queue size allowed for the feeder.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • getMaxQueueSize

        Gets the maximum feed queue size. The feeder uses an underlying queue to track which messages have been emitted from the component but not yet acked. This indicates how many messages may reside in the queue (in memory) at any given time.
        Specified by:
        getMaxQueueSize in interface Feeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
        Returns:
        The maximum queue size allowed for the feeder.

      • queueFull

        public boolean queueFull()
        Description copied from interface: Feeder
        Indicates whether the feed queue is full. Depending on the feeder implementation, this method may be used to check whether the feed queue is full prior to feeding additional data to a network.
        Specified by:
        queueFull in interface Feeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the feed queue is full.

      • setAutoRetry

        public T setAutoRetry(boolean retry)
        Description copied from interface: Feeder
        Sets the feeder auto-retry option. If this option is enabled, the feeder will automatically retry sending failed or timed out messages.
        Specified by:
        setAutoRetry in interface Feeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
        Parameters:
        retry - Indicates whether to automatically retry emitting failed data.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • setRetryAttempts

        public T setRetryAttempts(int attempts)
        Description copied from interface: Feeder
        Sets the number of automatic retry attempts for a single failed message.
        Specified by:
        setRetryAttempts in interface Feeder<T extends Feeder<T>>
        Parameters:
        attempts - The number of retry attempts allowed. If attempts is -1 then an infinite number of retry attempts will be allowed.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.
